resources.string: Updating... - Do not close the page!
UClass Smart Classroom provides independent services for different regions. Select your region before logging in.
Click a group below to view its screen
Request to enable floating (suspension) window failed!
The maximum number of screens allowed has been reached, no more can be selected!
A group screen (or more) is offline, ask students to open the UClass app on the group screen. \nIf UClass is on, ABC to re-connect the group screen.

Floating (Suspension) Window has to be enabled for UClass to run in the background during multi-screen broadcasting. Click the Confirm link to pop up the setting window and then enable Floating (Suspension) Window.
Multi-Screens feature requires a fixed IP address. Do not change the IP or connect to multiple networks (such as a wired one and Wi-Fi) at the same time.
Note: Do not change the group serial number of a screen unless necessary. If you did change the group serial number, refresh the teacher screen or restart the UClass app.

Failed to broadcast to the group screen! Check whether the group screen is online and try again. Click the Troubleshoot link on the group screen to check the screen status and then follow the instructions to troubleshoot.
The maximum number of pages has been reached. No more could be added.
The content being edited has not been saved. Unsaved content will be cleared when the whiteboard is closed. Are you sure you want to close the whiteboard?
Only files residing in the app can be opened. Path:
The current whiteboard is not saved. It will be overwritten by the newly opened one.
Click to enter the file name
Failed to save. Change the file name and then re-try.
Are you sure to delete the current page?
Welcome to the Multi-Screen Interaction System!
The Multi-Screen Interaction System is not activated
If you have not purchased the service, please DEF. If you have purchased, please restart the App.
Click the button on the right to start
Touch the screen and tap the Grid Menu button on either side of the screen\nSwitch to other apps or Windows system
For Android devices, please scan the QR code with the ULearning APP

Please check whether the IP address of the group screen is consistent with the pre-assigned IP address. Path: Group Screen Home > Settings > Advanced > Wired Network. If not, please change the group screen IP address or the pre-assigned IP address.
Check if UClass of the group screen is running
Try to close and then reopen the UClass app of the teacher screen and group screen

On the teacher screen UClass, click the Troubleshooting link to view the networking information. Check whether the IP address of the group screen is consistent with the pre-assigned IP address. If not, please change the group screen IP address or the pre-assigned IP address.
Changed successfully. Please close and then reopen UClass!
The format is incorrect! Please check the parameters.
Current network: Wi-Fi. To ensure broadcast clarity and stability, please use a wired network.
If the group screen is offline:
The IP address is incorrect! Please use the backup file to repair it.
Newer version available: UClass%s, want to update?
The current version is the latest version
If a group screen is offline, please check whether the UClass client of the group screen is turned on.
Launched successfully! Broadcasting teacher screen to group screen...
Failed to launch! Please click the Screen Broadcast button on the right to manually start the broadcast.
Please open the casting screen and try again
The number of screen casting devices supported by the smart screen has reached the limit. Please wait until someone exits casting and try again.
Turn on AirPlay (screen mirroring) to cast
Search and install ULearning app in Play Store. Use ULearning app to scan the QR code to cast.
Search and install IdeaShare. Open IdeaShare and enter the casting code to cast. You can find the code at the upper-right corner.
Connect to the classroom Wi-Fi to cast. Classroom Wi-Fi: %s \u00A0\u00A0\u00A0 Password: %s
Obtain Wi-Fi information from the classroom administrator. Click the Edit button to fill in the Wi-Fi name and password to save for future connections.

The smart screen is a shared device, and there are potential risks in saving the screenshots to this device. It is recommended to use the share function to save the screenshot content to the ULearning course session on the cloud. After saving, you can open the screenshot content from different locations for editing or share the content with the course session participants.
Please enter the classroom Wi-Fi and password

UClass requires storage permissions. In order to quickly locate problems that occur during software operation, UClass needs to record the software\'s operation log and store it locally. Please click Ok to enable storage permissions in the pop-up window.
\n stops screen recording since the recording function is being used by another app.
